dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:

* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new insoles.

title: Men's Tree Flyers
highlights: new bio-based swiftfoam™ midsole is light, bouncy, and ready for distance running
breathable upper helps keep the air flowing for extra comfortable miles
heel counter and flared, geometric midsole help keep your stride steady

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Tree Flyer has a carbon footprint of 9.92 kg CO2e Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. As a carbon neutral business certified by Climate Neutral, we balance our emissions by funding [high impact carbon projects](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/carbon-offset-projects).

**Low Energy, High Performance.** Innovative low-heat foaming process means our new SwiftFoam™ midsole production requires significantly less energy. 

**Bio-Based Bounce.** Thanks to the mighty castor bean, our SwiftFoam™ midsole is 48% bio-based. 

**Recycled Stability.** External heel counter made entirely of scraps from the SwiftFoam™ midsole production process.

**More Plants, Less Plastic.** Signature FSC-certified eucalyptus tree upper blend replaces the usual fully oil-based polyester or nylon upper without sacrificing any performance. Compared to traditional materials like nylon, our tree fiber cuts our carbon footprint in half.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) upper
* SwiftFoam™ midsole made with bio-based Pebax®
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* SweetFoam® insole foam
* ZQ merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Testing & Specs
dropdown.content:
The Tree Flyer went through an extensive testing and development process with over 100 runners logging thousands of miles across an array of conditions and climates. 

**Specs:**

Heel Drop8.5mm (Forefoot: 22.0mm, Heel: 30.5mm)Weight281.64g (9.93oz)

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. They’ll go back to their original shape in no time. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

text.p: lightweight and super springy, our new swiftfoam™ midsole makes your extra efforts feel effortless. it provides serious cushion and comfort, so even the toughest runs are easier on your body. and the flared, geometric design helps add stability to each and every stride.

made with breezy fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber, the supportive upper hugs your foot and keeps the air flowing for extra comfortable miles. the recycled heel counter gives you a more balanced and stable ride, so you can find your pace and forget about the rest.

the tree flyer is a bonafide road runner. fsc-certified natural rubber tread with a zonal traction pattern gives you a strong foothold on pavement. the outsole was also engineered to flex, helping to smooth out heel-to-toe transitions and increase energy return.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.

this is my favorite shoe to wear for comfort. i've had multiple. the first year i wore them until washing them couldn't get the smell out, and then i started buying a pair every year, even though they're still in great shape after a year.

text.h2: light on your feet. heavy on natural innovation.
text.p: how do you make superlight shoes? it starts at the midsole. to create our new superlight foam, we took sweetfoam’s sugarcane base and infused it with nitrogen (versus chemical foaming additives). the result? our lightest and lowest carbon midsole ever. it’s featherlight, high-performing, and even better for the planet thanks to approximately 70% bio-based content.

text.h2: a step closer to the cushion
text.p: we reimagined the traditional insert with a fully integrated insole (read: it’s built directly into the finished upper) for a supportive yet sleek underfoot feel that helps reduce material use.
made with breezy fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber, the breathable, multi-panel upper hugs your foot and keeps the air flowing for all-day comfort.

text.p: with airy mesh and springy, first-of-its kind foam, the superlight trainers add a whole new level of energy to any workout.

text.h2: light on your feet. heavy on natural innovation.
text.p: how do you make superlight shoes? it starts at the midsole. to create our new superlight foam, we took sweetfoam’s sugarcane base and infused it with nitrogen (versus chemical foaming additives). the result? our lightest and lowest carbon midsole ever.  it’s featherlight, high-performing, and even better for the planet thanks to approximately 70% bio-based content.

text.h2: a step closer to the cushion
text.p: we reimagined the traditional insert with a fully integrated insole (read: it’s built directly into the finished upper) for a supportive yet sleek underfoot feel that helps reduce material use.

made with a new breezy mesh (fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber combined with recycled monofilament), the multi-panel upper hugs your foot for ultimate stability and keeps the air flowing for all-day comfort.

text.h2: a technical trail shoe — made from nature, for nature
text.p: our first-ever running shoe designed for the trails is sustainably-engineered and intentionally designed for durability, comfort, and performance.

take on the hiking trails thanks to a breathable one-piece upper featuring durable ripstop protection, plus rugged, all-condition traction, stabilizing midsole support, and a sock-like collar that blocks debris.

what do you get when you combine the cushion of sweetfoam®, the comfort of wool, and the breathability of eucalyptus tree fiber? the trail runner swt — or “sugar, wool, tree”, featuring a eucalyptus tree fiber and wool blend upper, a sweetfoam® sugarcane midsole, and a natural rubber outsole, made from nature, for nature.

trail running should be about you, nature, and nothing else. that’s why we rigorously tested the trail runner swt over 2,000 miles with 100 runners of all ages, abilities, and body types. the real-world feedback, revisions (and revisions..) and miles logged on every type of wet, dry, and rocky trail are what help us get the comfort, fit and performance just right.

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Want the full refresh experience? Swap in some new laces and insoles.

text.p: keep your feet dry with our breathable, bio-based shield and wool upper treated with an eco passport certified (by oeko-tex®) fluorine-free water repellent coating.
reinforced wool upper seamlessly hugs your foot and provides engineered support for both speed and comfort. your feet stay warm, dry, and itch-free so you can get more miles in.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.

review.text: these were the first shoes that made me by all birds. i love the look of them and the way they fit. the only thing that i have an issue is the side sole of the shoe. the white material is not very durable, and it tears very easily. the other issue i have is that the white color can never be cleaned and just gets darker and darker. i’ve had them replace once before because the white started turning a light tan and now it is turning gray black. i’ve washed the shoes as suggested by the company and you can tell from the photos. the wear and tear is pretty awful considering i don’t wear them that often. i feel that for the price they charge they should hold up a lot better.

review.title: comfortable

review.title: perfect
review.text: these are exactly what i was looking for - comfortable, cute, goes with anything. the inside of the shoe is so soft it feels like walking on cushions. i have a bunion that makes finding shoes a challenge and these fit the bill.

review.title: what happened to the tree skippers?
review.text: these are my fourth or fifth pair of the tree skippers. i have no idea what happened, they are stiff and uncomfortable, compared to all of my other pairs. i would not recommend these anymore, i’m so disappointed with how they feel on my feet. i went back to my old ones which are extremely faded and have a hole in the toe, but they are so much more comfortable. did the design change? i think it may have a little bit. they sit higher on the top part of my foot, compared the older ones. the soles are stiffer and the fabric is not as breathable. really i want the old ones back so bad. these were my go to shoes for every part of my life up until recently. i have to find a new pair of go to shoes.

review.title: great casual sneaker
review.text: great casual sneaker for around town or traveling! these shoes were comfortable from the first day i wore them with no break-in period needed. they are comfortable for long days of walking while traveling and i love that they are machine washable. i sometimes have to wash mine twice to get them as clean as i like. if you’re a half size normally you may need to size up to the next whole size. i also love the company’s sustainability focus. very happy overall!

review.title: less comfortable than previous version
review.text: comfortable at first, but the heel is too thick and gave me blisters. i had the previous version of tree skippers and those were much more comfortable.

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Tree Flyer has a carbon footprint of 9.92 kg CO2e Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact. **Low Energy, High Performance.** Innovative low-heat foaming process means our new SwiftFoam™ midsole production requires significantly less energy. 

**Bio-Based Bounce.** Thanks to the mighty castor bean, our SwiftFoam™ midsole is 48% bio-based. 

**Recycled Stability.** External heel counter made entirely of scraps from the SwiftFoam™ midsole production process.

**More Plants, Less Plastic.** Signature FSC-certified eucalyptus tree upper blend replaces the usual fully oil-based polyester or nylon upper without sacrificing any performance. Compared to traditional materials like nylon, our tree fiber cuts our carbon footprint in half.

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) upper

text.p: lightweight and super springy, our new swiftfoam™ midsole makes your extra efforts feel effortless. it provides serious cushion and comfort, so even the toughest runs are easier on your body. and the flared, geometric design helps add stability to each and every stride.

made with breezy fsc-certified eucalyptus fiber, the supportive upper hugs your foot and keeps the air flowing for extra comfortable miles. the recycled heel counter gives you a more balanced and stable ride, so you can find your pace and forget about the rest.

the tree flyer is a bonafide road runner. fsc-certified natural rubber tread with a zonal traction pattern gives you a strong foothold on pavement. the outsole was also engineered to flex, helping to smooth out heel-to-toe transitions and increase energy return.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.

title: Women's Trail Runner SWT Mizzles
highlights: bio-based water-repellent shield keeps shoes and feet dry
rugged outsole grips hiking trails
tear-resistant ripstop mudguard protects feet from tough terrain

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Trail Runner SWT Mizzle is carbon neutral thanks to sustainable practices, like using more natural materials and funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects). But before we balance the emissions, its footprint starts at 9.5 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* FSC-certified TENCEL™ Lyocell (eucalyptus tree fiber) and ZQ Merino Wool blend upper
* Fluorine-free bio-based water-repellent shield
* ZQ Merino wool and recycled polyester ripstop
* SweetFoam® midsole made with sugarcane-based green EVA
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Bio-based TPU seam tape and heel counter
* Bio-based nylon eyelets
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* Castor bean oil-based insole foam
* ZQ Merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

dropdown.title: Sustainability
dropdown.content:
Our Wool Flyer Mizzle is carbon neutral thanks to sustainable practices, like using more natural materials and funding [high impact carbon projects](/pages/carbon-offset-projects). But before we balance the emissions, its footprint starts at 7.6 kg CO2e. Learn more about [carbon footprint labeling](/pages/footprint) and [our commitments](/pages/sustainable-practices) to reduce our impact.

**Sustainable Materials:**

* Fluorine-free bio-based water-repellent shield
* SwiftFoam™ midsole made with bio-based Pebax®
* FSC-certified natural rubber outsole
* Shoe laces made from recycled plastic bottles
* SweetFoam® insole foam
* ZQ Merino wool heel lining

dropdown.title: Care Guide
dropdown.content:
To preserve the Mizzle’s fluorine-free water-repellent treatment, we recommend spot cleaning with warm water and gentle soap whenever possible. If they need a deep clean, follow the below steps to machine wash, but only on a limited basis.

* Remove the laces and insoles.
* Place shoes in a delicates bag (pro tip: a pillowcase works too).
* Choose a gentle cycle with cold water & mild detergent.
* Shake out any excess water & set aside to air dry.
* Shoes will regain their original shape with one or two wears.

Handy tips: Don’t put them in the dryer. You can hand wash your laces and insoles on their own.

Check out our guide for more info on [how to wash your running shoes](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/how-to-wash-running-shoes).

dropdown.title: Shipping & Returns
dropdown.content:
Free shipping on orders over $75, and our 30 days, no questions asked return policy. Lightly worn shoes get donated to Soles4Souls. Visit our [Returns Portal](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/returns-exchanges).

Final Sale items cannot be returned or exchanged. Final Sale items include: gift cards, insoles, sock bundles, TrinoXO Face Masks, and items tagged final sale on our website and in Allbirds retail stores.

Need it sooner? See if the style you want is available at a [store near you](https://www.allbirds.com/pages/stores).

text.p: keep your feet dry with our breathable, bio-based shield and wool upper treated with an eco passport certified (by oeko-tex®) fluorine-free water repellent coating.
reinforced wool upper seamlessly hugs your foot and provides engineered support for both speed and comfort. your feet stay warm, dry, and itch-free so you can get more miles in.

lightweight and super springy, our new swiftfoam™ midsole makes your extra efforts feel effortless. it provides serious cushion and comfort, so even the toughest runs are easier on your body. and the flared, geometric design helps add stability to each and every stride.

we worked all the angles with our new swiftfoam™ midsole, literally cutting corners to help give you maximum cushioning with minimal weight. but we also went wide where needed. the flared heel design adds stability and helps keep your stride smooth and steady.
